alert.note: Alert for Quitman; Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay, western Randolph and Quitman Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Cuthbert. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cuthbert, Georgetown, Springvale Station, Wire Bridge, Watson Crossroads, Peterson Hill, Coles, White House, Moores Crossroads, Crossroads, Garnersville, Coleman, Hatcher, Morris, Bethel, Springvale and Cotton Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
